title: Roval’s new $650 Traverse Alloy enduro wheels are only 70g off carbon counterpart
content:
If you’re looking for a new wheelset that can take a beating and costs less than an ASX dropper, then you might want to check out Roval’s latest enduro mountain bike offering. Transitioning from carbon to alloy, the new Roval Traverse Alloy is a wide wheel that can hang in the rock gardens… Roval Traverse […]

The post Roval’s new $650 Traverse Alloy enduro wheels are only 70g off carbon counterpart appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
